<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Breath of the Dragon](/Feats.aspx?ID=5730) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Dragonblood" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=794" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 45 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

Tapping into the physiology of your draconic ancestor, you can exhale a torrent of energy in a 15-foot cone or a 30-foot line, dealing 1d4 damage. Each creature in the area must attempt a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) saving throw against the higher of your class DC or spell DC. You can't use this ability again for 1d4 rounds.

 At 3rd level and every 2 levels thereafter, the damage increases by 1d4. The shape of the breath, the damage type, and the saving throw match those of your draconic exemplar (see above). This ability has the trait associated with the type of damage it deals.

<title level="2">Breath of the Dragon leads to...</title>
[Formidable Breath](/Feats.aspx?ID=5740), [Lingering Breath](/Feats.aspx?ID=5746)
name: Breath of the Dragon
